     70 void build_index(code_searcher *cs, const vector<std::string> &argv) {
     71     if (argv.size() != 2) {
     72         fprintf(stderr, "Usage: %s [OPTIONS] config.json\n", argv[0].c_str());
     73         exit(1);
     74     }
     75 
     76     fs::path config_file_path(argv[1]);
     77     std::string json_text;
     78     fs::load_string_file(config_file_path, json_text);
     79 
     80     IndexSpec spec;
     81     auto status = google::protobuf::util::JsonStringToMessage(json_text, &spec, google::protobuf::util::JsonParseOptions());
     82     if (!status.ok()) {
     83         fprintf(stderr, "Parsing %s: %s\n", argv[1].c_str(), status.error_message().data());
     84         exit(1);
     85     }
     86     if (!spec.paths_size() && !spec.repos_size()) {
     87         fprintf(stderr, "%s: You must specify at least one path to index.\n", argv[1].c_str());
     88         exit(1);
     89     }
     90 
     91     if (spec.name().size())
     92         cs->set_name(spec.name());
     93     for (auto &path : spec.paths()) {
     94         fprintf(stderr, "Walking path_spec name=%s, path=%s\n",
     95                 path.name().c_str(), path.path().c_str());
     96         fs_indexer indexer(cs, path.path(), path.name(), path.metadata());
     97         if (path.ordered_contents().empty()) {
     98             fprintf(stderr, "  walking full tree\n");
     99             indexer.walk(path.path());
    100         } else {
    101             fprintf(stderr, "  walking paths from ordered contents list\n");
    102             fs::path contents_file_path = fs::canonical(path.ordered_contents(), config_file_path.remove_filename());
    103             indexer.walk_contents_file(contents_file_path);
    104         }
    105         fprintf(stderr, "done\n");
    106     }
    107 
    108     for (auto &repo  : spec.repos()) {
    109         fprintf(stderr, "Walking repo_spec name=%s, path=%s (including  submodules: %s)\n",
    110                 repo.name().c_str(), repo.path().c_str(), repo.walk_submodules() ? "true" : "false");
    111         git_indexer indexer(cs, repo.path(), repo.name(), repo.metadata(), repo.walk_submodules());
    112         for (auto &rev : repo.revisions()) {
    113             fprintf(stderr, "  walking %s\n", rev.c_str());
    114             indexer.walk(rev);
    115             fprintf(stderr, "  done\n");
    116         }
    117     }
    118 }

    120 void initialize_search(code_searcher *search,
    121                        int argc, char **argv) {
    122     if (FLAGS_load_index.size() == 0) {
    123         if (FLAGS_dump_index.size())
    124             search->set_alloc(make_dump_allocator(search, FLAGS_dump_index));
    125         else
    126             search->set_alloc(make_mem_allocator());
    127 
    128         vector<std::string> args;
    129         for (int i = 0; i < argc; ++i)
    130             args.push_back(argv[i]);
    131 
    132         timer tm;
    133         struct timeval elapsed;
    134         build_index(search, args);
    135         fprintf(stderr, "Finalizing...\n");
    136         search->finalize();
    137         elapsed = tm.elapsed();
    138         fprintf(stderr, "repository indexed in %d.%06ds\n",
    139                 (int)elapsed.tv_sec, (int)elapsed.tv_usec);
    140         metric::dump_all();
    141     } else {
    142         search->load_index(FLAGS_load_index);
    143     }
    144     if (FLAGS_dump_index.size() && FLAGS_load_index.size())
    145         search->dump_index(FLAGS_dump_index);
    146 }
    147 
    148 void listen_grpc(code_searcher *search, code_searcher *tags, const string& addr) {
    149     promise<void> reload_request;
    150     auto reload_request_ptr = FLAGS_reload_rpc ? &reload_request : NULL;
    151 
    152     unique_ptr<CodeSearch::Service> service(build_grpc_server(search, tags, reload_request_ptr));
    153 
    154     ServerBuilder builder;
    155     builder.AddListeningPort(addr, grpc::InsecureServerCredentials());
    156     builder.RegisterService(service.get());
    157     if (!FLAGS_reuseport) {
    158         builder.AddChannelArgument(GRPC_ARG_ALLOW_REUSEPORT, 0);
    159     }
    160     std::unique_ptr<Server> server(builder.BuildAndStart());
    161     if (!server) {
    162         die("Error starting GRPC server.");
    163     }
    164 
    165     if (FLAGS_reload_rpc && FLAGS_hot_index_reload) {
    166         die("reload_rpc and hot_index_reload options are mutually exclusive");
    167     }
    168 
    169     log("Serving...");
    170 
    171     if (FLAGS_reload_rpc) {
    172         thread shutdown_thread([&]() {
    173             reload_request.get_future().wait();
    174             server->Shutdown();
    175         });
    176         server->Wait();
    177         shutdown_thread.join();
    178     } else if (FLAGS_hot_index_reload && FLAGS_load_index.size()) {
    179         thread shutdown_thread([&]() {
    180             fswatcher watcher(FLAGS_load_index);
    181             if (!watcher.wait_for_event()) {
    182                 log("Error initializing filesystem watch. Hot index reloads will be disabled.");
    183                 std::promise<void>().get_future().wait();  // Block forever.
    184             }
    185             log("Detected change to index file; reloading...");
    186             server->Shutdown();
    187         });
    188         server->Wait();
    189         shutdown_thread.join();
    190     } else {
    191         server->Wait();
    192     }
    193 }
    194 
    195 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
    196     gflags::SetUsageMessage("Usage: " + string(argv[0]) + " <options> REFS");
    197     gflags::ParseCommandLineFlags(&argc, &argv, true);
    198 
    199     signal(SIGPIPE, SIG_IGN);
    200 
    201     while (true) {
    202         code_searcher search;
    203         unique_ptr<code_searcher> tags;
    204 
    205         initialize_search(&search, argc, argv);
    206         if (FLAGS_load_tags.size() != 0) {
    207             tags.reset(new code_searcher());
    208             tags->load_index(FLAGS_load_tags);
    209         }
    210 
    211         if (FLAGS_index_only)
    212             return 0;
    213 
    214         if (FLAGS_grpc.size()) {
    215             listen_grpc(&search, tags.get(), FLAGS_grpc);
    216         }
    217     }
    218 }
